title: just asking
body: is the league button right now meant to be grey or does it mean to be applying patches like all other updates

replies.body: When you're not sure, check the [Service Status Page](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/?en_AU#oce) (can be found to the left under the boards list). Right now the OCE servers are down for patch 6.1 maintenance.

> [{quoted}](name=Deep Terror Nami,realm=NA,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Vp0uAbV3,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-01-13T19:18:45.056+0000)
>
> When you're not sure, check the [Service Status Page](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/?en_AU#oce) (can be found to the left under the boards list). Right now the OCE servers are down for patch 6.1 maintenance.

ty nami
Should I be glad that I was busy sleeping during the maintenance....?:P

I'm pretty sure they're down for patch 6.1.
Does anyone know how long these new season patches usually take before the servers come up again?

> [{quoted}](name=Models,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Vp0uAbV3,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-01-13T19:23:40.652+0000)
>
> I'm pretty sure they're down for patch 6.1.
> Does anyone know how long these new season patches usually take before the servers come up again?

it says 6 hrs

what the fuck now i have to go outside today?
eh could be worse, maybe we'll get lucky and they'll come up before midday
